timeline.bodyText: @nfrankel We have a specialized CDC sink. I think the above code doesn't handle deleted persons. I'm not sure what r.value.toObject() returns for a ChangeRecord that represents a deletion, but since it is marked as @Nonnull I guess it's the deleted person. But we don't remove that person from the target map, we put it there.
